title: Full-Stack Developer
stack: Python, JavaScript, Django, React, Cypress, Jest, Docker, AWS, JSX, CSS/CSS3, HTML/HTML5, PostgreSQL
description: Contributed to the successful migration and rewrite of an existing web application from AngularJS to React, significantly improving UI/UX, code maintainability, performance, and test coverage.
Developed and maintained RESTful and WebSocket APIs using Python and Django, hosting the containerized application on cloud infrastructure (AWS) for enhanced scalability and reliability.
Integrated comprehensive API and UI end-to-end tests using Cypress and Supertest, ensuring the reliability and functionality of the application.

title: Full-Stack Developer

description: Utilized Figma to design and create mockups for a website, translating the envisioned user experience into an intuitive and visually appealing interface.
